message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 3-5-1, translated into en
data: According to the provisions of Decree No. 60/2018/ND-CP dated April 20, 2018 promulgating the National Statistical Reporting Regulation, the Ministry of Public Security is responsible for collecting the form “002. H/BCB-CA-Traffic accident”. The reporting period is June, month and year. Periodically, the Ministry of Public Security collects data and sends it to the General Statistics Office. According to the provisions of the Law on Statistics, the General Statistics Office is responsible for appraising data on national statistical indicators implemented by the Ministry of Public Security and disclosing information.
